body_html: IIUC, most of the problem is that it keeps rerunning cmake, is that right? (cd build && ninja install) might be a partial workaround, but it won't rebuild the Python bits so I guess you'll still need python setup.py develop too.
body_text: IIUC, most of the problem is that it keeps rerunning cmake, is that right? (cd build && ninja install) might be a partial workaround, but it won't rebuild the Python bits so I guess you'll still need python setup.py develop too.
body: IIUC, most of the problem is that it keeps rerunning cmake, is that right? `(cd build && ninja install)` might be a partial workaround, but it won't rebuild the Python bits so I guess you'll still need `python setup.py develop` too.
